titles.title: A bill to provide that section 3330a, 3330b, and 3330c of title 5, United States Code, relating to administrative and judicial redress and remedies for preference eligibles, shall apply with respect to the Federal Aviation Administration and the Transportation Security Administration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7384-7385)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committee.name: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. (text of measure as introduced: CR S7385)

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 11/10/2011--Introduced. Includes the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) and Transportation Security Administration (TSA) as agencies for purposes of federal employment provisions relating to administrative and judicial redress for veteran preference eligibles.
